findings.title: Excessive authority issue
findings.description: In the ROTL contract, the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE can set the minter role, the minter role can mint ERC721A tokens arbitrarily and the minter role is entitled to free mint without going through each rounds.

findings.title: Pausable is not implemented
findings.description: In the ROLTMint contract, it heritates the Pausable contract, but there is no pause and unpause function implemented. That means the value ot the _paused is false and can not be changed. Which will impact the __isEnable function and whenNotPaused modifier.
